column4: guys i cannot seam to install flash, i have copied the libflashplayer.so to every possible directory, and i keep trying to detect new plugins in opera, and it never finds them
try opera maybe youll have better luck with it
im seriously about to uninstall and reinstall win7 just because of this
i cant install flash on here, some gay bug i'd asume, since half the channel cant as well
nvidia fx5500, i have to reinstall drivers everytime i restart
here I have to select the resolution only by the nvidia-setting
same with me punkx, everytime i reinstall it reverts back to the failsafe xorg, i have to killall gdm, then reinstall my gfx drivers, then use the system

yeah, i just think its stupid that everytime theres a flash update ubuntu users have to wait god knows how long to have working flash
